data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Couri, Márcia S., Pont, Adrian C. (2017): African Spilogona Schnabl: morphology of the male terminalia and description of a new species (Diptera: Muscidae). Zootaxa 4277 (2): 295-300, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4277.2.12|10 occurrences
